meta_title: CMMS Meaning: The 2025 Strategic Guide for Operations Leaders
meta_description: Go beyond the basic definition. Discover the true CMMS meaning: a strategic tool for reducing downtime, cutting costs, and driving operational excellence.
title: CMMS Meaning: More Than an Acronym, It's Your 2025 Operations Command Center

hero_image.alt: Hero image for CMMS Meaning: More Than an Acronym, It's Your 2025 Operations Command Center

image_prompt: A photorealistic, professional image set in a bright, clean, modern manufacturing facility. A diverse team of three people is collaborating around a large, complex piece of industrial machinery with a robotic arm. A female maintenance manager of Hispanic descent with a hard hat and safety glasses is holding a tablet displaying colorful graphs and work order data. A male technician of African descent, also in a hard hat and high-visibility vest, is pointing to a specific component on the machine. A third engineer, a Caucasian woman with her hair tied back in a net, looks on, holding a clipboard. The atmosphere is collaborative, high-tech, and positive. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the clean environment. There is no text in the image.
